sentences.en: During each show we will be raffling a fabulous prize.
sentences.cn: 每场表演期间，我们将以抽彩方法送出大奖。

sentences.en: During fever a large quantity of fluid is lost in perspiration.
sentences.cn: 发烧时，大量水分会通过排汗而丧失。

sentences.en: During the 1980s the world's financial systems became more open.
sentences.cn: 在20世纪80年代，世界金融体系变得更加开放。

sentences.en: During the festival, we'll be showing 13 classic oldie films.
sentences.cn: 我们将在电影节期间展映13部经典老片.

sentences.en: During the filming, Curtis fell in love with his co-star, Christine Kaufmann.
sentences.cn: 在电影摄制过程中，柯蒂斯爱上了同他联袂主演的明星克里斯汀·考夫曼。

sentences.en: During the summer she worked as a lifeguard.
Foxes remain hidden during the day.
He lost two stone in weight during his time there.
sentences.cn: 他在那儿的时候体重下降了2英石。

sentences.en: He slept calmly during the early part of the night.
He spoke no English and was completely silent during the visit.
sentences.cn: 他不会说英语，参观过程中一言未发。

sentences.en: His trial revived memories of French suffering during the war.
sentences.cn: 他的受审重新勾起了在战争中受苦受难的法国人民的回忆。

sentences.en: I had a case of the jitters during my first two speeches.
sentences.cn: 我在最初两次讲演时感到非常紧张。

sentences.en: Say's writings reached a wide audience during his lifetime.
sentences.cn: 在塞伊有生之年，他的作品拥有大量的读者。

sentences.en: She produced the knife during arguments with her friends.
sentences.cn: 在和朋友争吵的时候，她掏出了刀。

sentences.en: She rejected his advances during the trip to Cannes.
sentences.cn: 在去往戛纳的途中，她拒绝了他的挑逗。

sentences.en: The subject came up during a pre-dinner drink with our guests.
sentences.cn: 在与客人喝餐前酒的时候，有人提到了这个话题。

sentences.en: Twelve inmates have been killed during a riot at the prison.
sentences.cn: 12名犯人在一场监狱暴乱中被杀害。

sentences.en: Walking and golf increased in popularity during the 1980s.
sentences.cn: 在20世纪80年代越来越多的人喜欢上了远足或是打高尔夫球。

trans.tran_en: from the beginning to the end of a period of time
